name: Manta Style
lore: An axe made of reflective materials that causes confusion amongst enemy ranks.

descriptions.name: Mirror Image
descriptions.description: Creates 2 images of your hero that last 20 seconds. Melee images deal 33% damage and take 350% damage, while Ranged images deal 28% and take 400% damage. Cooldown increased by 15.0 seconds on ranged heroes.Dispel Type: Basic Dispel

notes: Has a 0.1 second cast time during which you are invulnerable.
Many effects are removed upon using Manta.
Yasha based movement speed bonuses from multiple items do not stack.
